articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Tunisian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Tunisian Ambassador to DPRK
						

					 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from new Tunisian Ambassador to the DPRK Mohamed Adel Smaoui at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to PM of Thailand
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to PM of Thailand 
						

					 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim Monday sent a message of sympathy to Yingluck Shinawatra, prime minister of Thailand, as regards the flood that hit all parts of Thailand, claiming big casualties and material losses.
					
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the victims and the bereaved families and hoped that the government and people of Thailand would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster and bring the living of the people in the afflicted areas to normal as soon as possible.

articles.title: ITTF President Arrives
articles.content:
ITTF President Arrives
						

					 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Adam Sharara, president of the International Table Tennis Federation, and his party arrived here on Wednesday.
